code:
flowchart TD
    Agents[Infra_RedisCache] -->|"push"| Inbox[Infra_RedisCache]
    Inbox -->|"classify-inbox.mjs"| Classified[Infra_RedisCache]
    AgentsManifest[Infra_IngressController] -->|"agent-bus.mjs"| GitHubIssue[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    RepoScan[Infra_EtcdCluster] --> ToolsDir[Infra_WorkerNode]
    Classified -->|"build-insights.mjs"| Insights[Infra_WorkerNode]
    ToolsDir -->|"Astro Build"| Site[Infra_IngressController]
    Insights -->|"Astro Build"| Site
    GitHubActions[Infra_RedisCache] -->|"run scripts"| RepoScan
    GitHubActions -->|"run scripts"| ClassifyScript[Infra_IngressController]
    GitHubActions -->|"run scripts"| InsightsScript[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    GitHubActions -->|"run scripts"| AgentBusScript[Infra_IngressController]
    GitHubActions -->|"build"| Site
    Site -->|"deploy"| GitHubPages[Infra_WorkerNode]
repo_description: Personal portfolio and intelligence hub - adrianwedd.com website with integrated AI-powered content management and dynamic data visualization
